EmailTemplate.name: LSW NCS Action Day 2016
EmailTemplate.subject: Lights, Camera, SOCIAL ACTION! 2 DAYS TO GO
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
NCS Action Day 2016 is just 2 DAYS AWAY!
THIS IS GOING TO BE BIG!
With performances from MC Infecta , Joshua Kyeot and Represent FMs House DJ Lorrelle Lambert - what more would you want?
Can't makea social action project? Don't miss out? Click here to purchase a ticket for just £3.00!
Click here to sign up to a project and reserve yourself a FREE ticket to our celebration event, or scoll down to find out more about the individual opportunities!
BEXLEY AND BROMLEY YOUTH BOARD!
YOUTH VS POVERTY
Support the Bexley and Bromley Youth Board collect donations and give out care packages to those affected by homelessness in South London.
Starts in New Eltham...
Click to find out more...
GREENWICH AND LEWISHAM YOUTH BOARD
WITNESS THE FITNESS
Get involved in a community sports event and fun-day organised by the Greenwich and Lewisham Youth Board!
Taking place in Greenwich Park!
Click to find out more...
CROYDON YOUTH BOARD
#BLANKET2016
Join the Croydon Youth Board raise money and give out care packages to the homeless in Croydon!
Starts in Queens Park, Croydon...
Click to find out more...
REGIONAL YOUTH BOARD
#HUMANS OFLONDON
Join the Regional Youth Board launch a campaign to to find out how socially mixed London really is.
Starts at Conway Hall, Holborn
Click to find out more...
SOUTHWARK AND LAMBETH YOUTH BOARD
T-DAY YOUTH SHOWCASE!
A one off showcase of music, spoken word and poetry by the Southwark and Lambeth Youth Board.
Taking place in the Prince of Wales, Brixton...
Click to find out more...
LAST CHANCE TO BE AN NCS AMBASSADOR!
BE AND NCS AMBASSADOR!
This is your last opportunity to train to be an NCS Ambassador in 2016 and help our Sales team champion NCS this summer!
Training will take place in Waterloo
Click to find out more...
DRAGONS DEN
PITCH TO FUND YOUR OWN SOCIAL ACTION PROJECT!
Do you want to start your own social action project with other NCS grads. Pitch for up to £500!
Taking place in Conway Hall from 13:00.
Click to find out more...
SOUTHWARK ACTION TEAM!
BLAST FROM THE PAST
Volunteer in a local care home and spend the day helping residents do fun and creative activities!
Taking place in Helmi House, Southwark
Click to find out more...
Head to TCSSOUTHLONDON.CO.UK to find our more about all the events and opportunities for you to be involve in!
By getting involved in any of the projects you will recieve a FREE ticket to the NCS Action Day celebration event or you can pay for a ticket by clicking here.
Like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information.
Rhiannon
